# lastEventTimestamp

**Instance Property**

The time of the most recent change to an element’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
var lastEventTimestamp: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Getting change information

- **valueDidChangeHandler**: The block that the profile calls when an element’s value changes.
